titles.title: Home School Equity Act for Tax Relief of 2010

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for 1 year the deduction for expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers and to allow such deduction with respect to home school expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/29/2010--Introduced. Home School Equity Act for Tax Relief of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) extend through 2010 the tax deduction for expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers; and (2) expand the definition of "school" for purposes of such tax deduction to include a home school.
